Buy for $17.50 (Reg. $25)

What we love

There are more robust toothbrushes out there, but they tend to carry what some might consider to be a crazy high price tag. For the folks that are content with a basic battery-powered toothbrush, the Philips Sonicare One has you covered at $17.50 with several colorways to choose from.

items.summary: Cheney became one of the most powerful vice-presidents in US history under Bush, and was a key architect in his "war on terror".

items.title: Curfew lifted in Tanzania's main city after election unrest
items.summary: Families continue to search for or bury relatives, a day after President Samia Suluhu Hassan was sworn in.

items.title: Netflix in talks to license video podcasts from iHeartMedia, report says

items.title: Wikipedia co-founder joins editing conflict over the Gaza genocide page
items.summary: Wikipedia co-founder Jimmy Wales has jumped into a conflict over the online encyclopedia’s page on “Gaza genocide.” Just days after a Wikipedia editor froze changes to the article, Wales posted a statement on a page dedicated to discussing edits, saying the article “requires immediate correction” and is part of a broader neutrality problem on the […]

items.title: Google unveils Project Suncatcher to launch two solar-powered satellites, each with four TPUs, into low Earth orbit in 2027, as it seeks to scale AI compute (Reed Albergotti/Semafor)
items.summary:
Reed Albergotti / Semafor:
Google unveils Project Suncatcher to launch two solar-powered satellites, each with four TPUs, into low Earth orbit in 2027, as it seeks to scale AI compute  —  The demand for AI data centers has grown so large that there isn't enough energy on earth to power the buildout.

items.title: Cameroon security forces killed 48 in election protests, U.N. sources say
items.summary: DAKAR (Reuters) -Cameroon's security forces killed 48 civilians as they responded to protests against the re-election of President Paul Biya, the world's oldest ruler, according to data shared with Reuters on Tuesday by two U.N. sources. Read full story

items.title: Paris prosecutors open a probe into TikTok's algorithm and compliance with requirements to police and report suicide content, after a French government report (Gaspard Sebag/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Gaspard Sebag / Bloomberg:
Paris prosecutors open a probe into TikTok's algorithm and compliance with requirements to police and report suicide content, after a French government report  —  TikTok is under investigation in France for failing to vet material that promotes suicide on the Chinese video-sharing platform.

Outfitted with two Type-C and one USB-A port, this wall charger is ready to send 100W to a single device, or distribute it between up to three. I like that INIU bundles a USB-C cable too, allowing you to get up and running all in one go.

items.title: Phone location data of top EU officials for sale, report finds
items.summary: Journalists in Europe found it was "easy" to spy on top European Union officials using commercially obtained location data sold by data brokers, despite the continent having some of the strongest data protection laws in the world.

items.summary:
As part of its early Black Friday Sale, EcoFlow has launched the first of the event’s 48-hour flash sales, with up to 61% discounts on three offers to either start or expand your existing backup power setups. Things start with the DELTA 3 Series Smart Extra Battery with a DELTA 3 waterproof bag for $399 shipped. This bundle would run $698 in full, and $508 with the current discounts, if you bought the station and bag separately, which you can’t find bundled on other marketplaces like Amazon. While we have seen the station alone going as low as $389 up until today, this bundle is benefiting from a 43% markdown that cuts $299 off the tag for the best price we have tracked. Head below to check out the full lineup of 48-hour flash deals.

items.title: Anthropic projects $70B in revenue by 2028: Report
items.summary: The Information reports that Anthropic expects to generate as much as $70 billion in revenue and $17 billion in cash flow in 2028. The growth projections are fueled by rapid adoption of Anthropic’s business products, a person with knowledge of the company’s financials said.

There are plenty of compact flash drives out there, but this new model definitely takes the crown for being an ultra-tiny flash drive that’s super easy to carry around. items.summary:
Meir Orbach / CTech:
Tel Aviv-based Daylight, whose AI-native platform autonomously identifies and contains cyber threats, raised a $33M Series A, bringing its total funding to $40M  —  Backed by Craft Ventures and top Israeli founders, the Tel Aviv-based company is building an AI-driven security platform to modernize detection and response.

items.title: EcoFlow’s early Black Friday sale offers up to 80% off power stations with bonus savings, free gifts, and more starting from $75
items.summary:
EcoFlow has launched its early Black Friday Sale with up to 80% discounts, extra sitewide savings, member-only deals, free gifts, and more. Among the lineup, we spotted a very camping-capable bundle in EcoFlow’s new DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station that gets a FREE TRAIL 200 DC 60,000mAh power station at $759.05 shipped, after using the code 25EFBFAFF at checkout for an additional 5% savings. One of the latest releases that has only been available since late September with a $1,499 MSRP, we’ve only seen it getting a free trolley up until this sale, with discounts having seen it drop to $759 and a $721 low. While you may be getting the second-best price we have tracked with $740 savings off the DELTA 2 Max, you are getting more value than past offers as the TRAIL station gives you a bonus 60,000mAh charging solution without shelling out up to its $200 MSRP. This deal beats out Amazon too, where you’re only getting the trolley with the station at $799. Head below for the full EcoFlow early Black Friday lineup.

items.title: Lula says Brazil will seek independent probe into 'disastrous' Rio police raid
items.summary: BELEM, Brazil (Reuters) -Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Tuesday his government will push for an independent probe into a police raid last week in Rio de Janeiro that killed 121 people, including four police officers. Read full story

items.title: Injured, malnourished survivors from Sudan's al-Fashir recount escape
items.summary: (Reuters) -At a clinic in Sudan's North Darfur where dozens of bony children lie on cots and men with bandaged wounds await surgery, patients described a desperate escape from the city of al-Fashir as it was captured last week by a paramilitary force.  Read full story

Don’t forget to enter promo code EXTRAFIVE during checkout to see the discounted price. This model originally launched at $500 earlier this year before jumping up to the $550 mark later. Today’s deal delivers a straight-up $180 discount on its usual going rate, landing it $29 below its previous all-time low and our mention from a couple of months back. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this compact yet powerful Android tablet, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.title: Score Animal Crossing New Horizons down at $45 before the $5 Switch 2 upgrade pack launches
items.summary:
Nintendo recently unveiled the upcoming Animal Crossing New Horizons Switch 2 version, as well as a FREE update to the Switch version. But for folks who for some reason haven’t scored a copy of the Switch version, Woot is offering physical boxed versions down at $44.99 Prime shipped from the usual $60 list price. This of course isn’t the Switch 2 version, but there will be a $5 upgrade pack – this means you can land the game on Switch 1 for $45 and the upgrade pack to score everything the boxed Switch 2 version has for $50, instead of paying the full $65 list price on the Switch 2 Edition. Everything you need to know about the new Switch 2 Edition and FREE update await right here. 

  • Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Switch 2 Edition $63 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Switch 2 Edition $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Mario Kart World $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree – Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV $70 (Reg. $80)

Nintendo officially announces Animal Crossing: New Horizons Switch 2 Edition + FREE update

You’d usually be shelling out $1,599 and $1,999 for these models at full price, with the 800 model going as low as $1,199 for the short window of last month’s Prime Day event, while the 1500 model has spent a little more time as low as $1,599. With the exclusive code here, you’re looking at 28% and 23% discounts that cut $450 off both tags for the best new prices we’ve seen anywhere. items.title: A profile of nonprofit Common Crawl, which has scraped billions of webpages since 2013, including paywalled ones, to build an archive used by OpenAI and others (Alex Reisner/The Atlantic)
items.summary:
Alex Reisner / The Atlantic:
A profile of nonprofit Common Crawl, which has scraped billions of webpages since 2013, including paywalled ones, to build an archive used by OpenAI and others  —  Editor's note: This work is part of AI Watchdog, The Atlantic's ongoing investigation into the generative-AI industry.
